TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed VBFixedArrayAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class VBFixedArrayAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class VBFixedArrayAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: Indicates that an array in a structure or non-local variable should be treated as a fixed-length array.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Visual Basic arrays are of variable length by default. This attribute is useful when using Visual Basic file input and output functions, such as `FileGet` and `FilePut`, and API calls that require fixed-length arrays.
## Examples [!code-vb[VbCnAttributes#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbCnAttributes/VB/Class2.vb#22)]
> [!NOTE] > The `VBFixedArrayAttribute` is informational and does not allocate any storage. The purpose of this attribute is to modify how arrays in structures and non-local variables are used by methods or API calls that recognize the `VBFixedArrayAttribute`. Keep in mind that this attribute does not convert a variable length array to a fixed array and that you must still allocate array storage using `Dim` or `ReDim` statements.

Docs.summary: Initializes the value of the property.

Docs.param: Initializes the value of upper field, which represents the size of the first dimension of the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The constructor runs when the `VBFixedArrayAttribute` attribute is applied to an array.
